title: Find the Colors
content: Can you find something red in your room? Now look for something blue! Let's explore all the beautiful colors around us together.
description: An interactive color-finding game for young children
author: Story Templates System

title: Memory Match
content: Remember the sequence I show you! First a clap, then a hop, then a spin. Can you repeat it? Let's make it longer each time!
description: A memory and movement game to develop recall skills
author: Story Templates System
